name: Run build configuration as generated user
description: Super-admin creates new user, new user creates project, project build configuration and runs it

steps.name: Create test user with fake user-data, generate fake project data

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/users with data: {'username': 'and', 'password': 'xZ6F55A9oP5', 'email': 'burkemisty@example.com', 'roles': {'role': [{'roleId': 'PROJECT_ADMIN', 'scope': 'g'}]}}, expected_status: 200
Auth user with creds: "('and', 'xZ6F55A9oP5')" and get csrf token
Sending GET request to http://localhost:8111/authenticationTest.html?csrf with data: None, expected_status: 200
Send request to create new project

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/projects with data: {'parentProject': {'locator': '_Root'}, 'name': 'practice', 'id': 'I9VZWia72o2', 'copyAllAssociatedSettings': True}, expected_status: 200
Check if generated fake project ID: "I9VZWia72o2" equals ID from respond "I9VZWia72o2"
Create build conf for created project I9VZWia72o2

Create build configuration with data: {'id': 'BKH8BBPpH92', 'name': 'know', 'project': {'id': 'I9VZWia72o2'}, 'steps': {'name': 'chair', 'type': 'give', 'properties': {'property': [{'name': 'script.content', 'value': "echo 'Hello World!'"}, {'name': 'teamcity.step.mode', 'value': 'default'}, {'name': 'use.custom.script', 'value': 'true'}]}}}

Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/buildTypes with data: {'id': 'BKH8BBPpH92', 'name': 'know', 'project': {'id': 'I9VZWia72o2'}, 'steps': {'name': 'chair', 'type': 'give', 'properties': {'property': [{'name': 'script.content', 'value': "echo 'Hello World!'"}, {'name': 'teamcity.step.mode', 'value': 'default'}, {'name': 'use.custom.script', 'value': 'true'}]}}}, expected_status: 200
Check if created fake build conf ID: "BKH8BBPpH92" equals ID from respond "BKH8BBPpH92"
Test run created project build configuration with id: BKH8BBPpH92
Sending POST request to http://localhost:8111/app/rest/buildQueue with data: {'buildType': {'id': 'BKH8BBPpH92'}}, expected_status: 200
Verify that build with create fake id: "BKH8BBPpH92" equals to build conf that was launched: "BKH8BBPpH92"

labels.name: story
labels.value: As project admin run build configuration
